chapter.text: ya ssin
jihyelo chungmanhan kkulan-eul dugo maengsehanani
geudaeneun seonjijadeul gaunde han seonjijalo
oleun gil-eul ganeun jala
geugeos-eun gwonneung-gwa jabilo chungman hasin hananim-i naelisin gyesilosseo
ineun geudeul-ui seonjodeul-i gyeong-gobadji anihan baegseongdeul-ege geudaelo ha yeogeum gyeong-goke hagoja ham-ila geuleo na geudeul-eun juuihaji anhhaessnola
geu malsseum-i geudeul dasu wie jin lilo natanass-euna geudeul-eun midji a nihadeola
hananim-eun geudeul-ui mog-e meong-eleulssuiuni geugeos-i geudeul-ui teogkkaji i leumae geudeul-ui gogaega wilo olla bolsu eobsge doeeossdeola
hananim-i geudeul ap-e jang-aemul-eulnohgo geudeul dwiedo jang-aemul-eul dumyeo geudeul wie deopgaeleul ssuiuni geudeul-eun boji mushadeola
geudaega geudeul-ege gyeong-goleul hadeon gyeong-goleul ani hadeon geudeul-eun machangajilo midji anhnola
malsseum-eul ttaleugo boiji anihasin hananim-eul dulyeowo haneun jadeul ege gyeong-gohago geuegeneun gwan-yong-gwa eunhyeloun bosang-i iss-eul geos-ilaneun bog-eum-eul jeonhala
bola hananim-i jug-eunjaleul sosaengsikyeo geudeul-i apseo haenghan geosdeulgwa geudeul-i namgin geosdeul-eul giloghanola sillo geubun-eun modeun geosdeul-eul bunmyeonghan jangbue jeog-eo dunola
geu go-eul-ui jumindeul-ege seonjijadeul-i biyuleul deul-eo seolmyeonghanola

geuttae hananim-eun geudeul-ege dumyeong-ui seonjijadeul-eul bonaess-euna geudeul eun seonjijadeul-eul bu-inhamae geubun-eun sebeonjjae seonjijaleul bonaeeo ganghage hani ideul-i malhagil sillo ulineun neohuileul wihae bonaeeojin seonjijadeul-i la hadeola
ittae baegseongdeul-i neohuineun uli wa gat-eun ingan-e bulgwahamyeo hananim kkeseoneun amuleon gyesido naeliji a nihaessneunde sillo neohuineun geojismal-eul hago iss-eul ppun-ila malhani
geudeul-i malhagileul junim-eun a sinola sillo ulineun neohuileul wihae bonaeeojin seonjijadeullosseo
uliui uimuneun danji bunmyeonghan malsseum-eul jeonhaneunde iss-eul ppun-ila

geudeul-i malhagil ulineun bunmyeong hi dangsindeullobuteo ag-un-eul jeomchyeoss-euni man-il neohuiga jungjihaji anhneundamyeon neohuiege tuseog hal geos-ila neohuineun ulilobuteo gotongseuleoun beol-eul bad-eu lila hadeola
ittae seonjijadeul-i malhagil neo huiui hyungjoneun neohuiwa hamkke issnola neohuiga hungyeleul bad-ass-eum-edo geuleo neunyo neohuineun joeag-e ppajin baegseong-ila
geuttae geu ma-eul meongos-eulobuteo han namjaga dallyeowa malhagil baegseongdeul iyeo seonjijadeul-eul ttaleusoseo
yeoleobunkke bosang-eul guhaji a nihan geubundeul-eul ttaleusoseo geubundeul-eun-indohasim-eul bad-eun bundeul-ila
naleul changjohasigo ttohan yeoleo bun-i geubun-egelo gwiuihal geubun-eul naega gyeongbae anihal iyuga eobs-euni
naega hananim anin daleun sin-eulgyeongbaehaeya doeneunyo hananimkkeseoneun naege jaeang-eul jusil ttae geudeul-ui jungjaeneunnaege soyong-i eobs-eumyeo naleul guwonhal su eobsnola
man-il naega geuleohge handamyeon sillo naneun banghwanghage doelila
sillo naneun dangsindeul-ui junim-eul midnani naege gwileul giul-isiyo
cheongug-eulo deul-eogala mal-eul deul eumae naui baegseongdeul-i algo iss-eoss-eo ya haessneunde lago malhadeola
junimkkeseo naui joeleul sahayeo jusa nalo hayeogeum eunhyebadneunja ga unde issge hayeossnola
hananim-eun geu ihulo geuui baegseong-e daehayeo haneul-eseo eotteon byeongsa do bonaeji anihaess-euni geuleohge hal pyeol-yodo eobs-eossnola
sillo haneullobuteo hanbeon-ui gang han jilpung-i iss-eoss-eul ppun-inde geuttae geudeul moduneun jaecheoleom salajigo eobsdeo la
ga-eobs-eun jongdeul-ila geudeul-ege seonjijaga ileul ttaemada geudeul-eun jo longhal ppun-ieossnola
hananim-i geudeul ijeon-e eolma na manh-eun sedaeleul myeolmanghaessneunji geudeul eun alji mosham-inyo sillo geudeul-eun dasi dol-agaji moshanila
geuleona geudeul moduneun hananim ege bulliwo omae
ittae geudeul-eul wihan yejeung-eun jug-eun daejiga doelini hananim-eun geugeos eul saengdongke hayeo geugos-eulobuteo gog sig-i naodolog hani geudeul-eun geugeos eul meogdoda
hananim-eun geu an-e jonglyeonamu wa podonamuga issneun nag-won-eul dugo geugos-eulo mul-i heuleudolog hayeo
geudeul-i mandeulji anihan gwail eul meogdolog haess-euna geulaedo geudeul-eun gamsahal jul moleudeola
hananimkke yeong-gwang-i iss-eusoseo geubunkkeseoneun daejiga saengsanhaneun modeungeos-eul jaung-eulo dusyeossgo ingando geu ligo alji moshaneun geosdo jaung-eulo jieusyeossnola
geudeul-eul wihan yejeung-eulo bam-i issnani hananim-i naj-eul geodueo gandamyeon geudeul-eun amheug sog-e issge doelila
taeyang-eun geuui gwedoleul unhaengha ni geugeos-eun gwonneung-gwa asim-eulo chungman hasin geubun-ui myeonglyeong-isila
dal-eul dueo geuui gwedoleul unhaeng ke hani olaedoen memaleun jonglyeonamu gajicheoleom dasi dol-aonila
taeyang-i dal-eul jab-eul su eobs-eumyeo bam-i naj-eul chuwolhaji moshani gagja neun gagjaui gwedoleul beobchig-e ttala un haenghal ppun-ila
geudeul-eul wihan yejeung-i issgeoneul hananim-i geudeul-ui jasondeul-eul jim sil eun bangjue taewossnola
hananim-eun geudeul-eul wihayeo geu deul-i seungseonhal geuwa yusahan baeleul mandeul-eo jusyeossnola
hananim-eun geubun-ui tteus-i iss-eoss damyeon igsahage haess-eul geos-ila geuttae geudeul-eun guwon-ui oechim-eul deul-eojul jaga-eobs-euni gujedoeji moshaess-eul geos-ila
geuleona hananim-ui eunhyelo jam sidong-an geudeul-eul hyanglagke haessnola
neohui ijeon-ui geos-eul dulyeowo hago neohui ihue iss-eul geos-eul dulyeowo hala geudeul-ege gyeong-goga iss-eossgeo neul geulihamyeon geudeul-i eunhyeleul bad-eu lila
geudeul-ege hananim yejeung gaun de eotteon yejeung-i odeonji geudeul-eun geugeos-eulobuteo deung-eul dollieossnola

hananim-i neohuiege buyeohan il-yonghal yangsig-eulo jaseon-eul bepullaneunmalsseum-i iss-eoss-eul ttae bulsinjadeul-i mid neun jadeul-ege malhayeossdeola hananim-uitteus-i issdamyeon geubunkkeseo yang-yughal geu deul-eul uliga yang-yughalan mal-inyo sil lo neohuineun keuge banghwanghago iss-eul ppun-ila
deohayeo malhagil neohuiga malhan geos-i jinsil-ilamyeon i yagsog-eun eonje oneunyo
geuleona geudeul-eun ganghan jilpung-eul gidaligo iss-eul ppun-ila geudeul-i seo loga nonjaenghago iss-eul ttae geugeos-i geudeul-eul huibsseul-eo galila
geuttae geudeul-egeneun yueonhal gi hoedo eobs-eul geos-imyeo geudeul gajog-eulo dol-akal gihoedo eobs-eul geos-ila
napal-ui soliga deullini bola geudeul-eun mudeom-eulobuteo seodulleo junimkkelo naganila

geudeul-eun malhalila o seulpeudo da uliui chimsang-eseo ulileul il-eu kineun jaga nugunyo ittae han eumseong-ideullyeooni geugeos-eun jabiloun bun-i yagsoghasigo seonjijadeul-i geu jinlileulmalhan geos-ila
ganghan jilpung-i mol-achija bola geuttae geudeul moduneun hananim ap-eulo bulliwo odeola
geunal-eneun jogeumdo bujeonghage cheolidoeji ani hani neohuineun neohui ga haenghan geos-eulo bosang-eul bad-eulila
sillo geunal cheongug-e geojuhaneun jadeul-eun geudeul-i haenghan modeun geos-eulo keuge gippeohalila
geudeul-eun geuui anaedeulgwa siwon han geuneul-eseo jangsigdoen chimsang-e gidae eo
modeun gwail-eul jeulgimyeo geudeul-i wonhaneun modeun geos-eul gajge doemyeo
pyeong-anhalaneun jabiloun junim-uimalsseum-eul deuddeola
joeindeul-iyeo oneul-eun neohuileul uiloun jadeullobuteo bunlisikilila
adam-ui jasondeul-iyeo naega neohuiege illeo satan-eul sungbaehaji malla geuneun neohuideul-ui bunmyeonghan jeog-ila
geuleomeulo naman-eul gyeongbaehala geugeos-i olh-eun gil-ila haji anihaessdeonyo
geuleona satan-eun neohui gaundemanh-eun mulileul banghwangtolog haessnani neohuineun ihaehaji moshaessneunyo
igeos-i neohuiege banboghayeo yagsoghan jiog-ila
hwayeom-eul masbola igeos-eun neohuiga gojibhayeo jinlileul geoyeoghan ttaemun-ila
geunal hananib-eun geudeul-ui ib-eul bonghani geudeul-ui sondeul-i hananim-egeiyagi hago geudeul-ui baldeul-eun geudeul i haenghan modeun geos-eul jeung-eonhapeola
hananim-ui tteus-i iss-eossdamyeon hananim-eun geudeul-ui silyeog-eul as-a gass-eu lila geuttae geudeul-eun gil-eul deodeum-eo chaj-euna geudeul-eun eotteohge bol su issneunyo
hananim-ui tteus-i iss-eossdamyeon geu deul-ui jangso-e gojeongsikyeoss-eul geos-imyeo geuttae geudeul-eun umjig-il sudo eobs-eoss-eul geos-imyeo dasi dol-aol sudo eobs-eul geos ila
hananim-i jangsuhage hasa ha nanim-i geulo hayeo dasi doedol-a ga ge hanani geulaedo geudeul-eun ihaeha ji moshaneunyo
hananim-eun yeeonja-ege sileul galeuchiji anihaess-eumyeo siin-eun geu ege jeoghabhaji anhnola igeos-eun me sejilo sasil-eul balghyeojuneun kkulan-ila
igeos-eulo sal-aissneun ideul-e ge gyeong-gohago bulsinjadeul-egeneun jin liui malsseum-i silhyeondoege hayeossnola
geudeul-eun hananim-i geudeul-eul wi hae changjohan gachugdeul-eul geudeullo hayeo geum daseulige han geos-eul alji moshagoissneunyo
hananimkkeseo geugeosdeullo hayeogeumgeudeul-ui sseu-im-e sunjongke hayeo ilbu neun geudeul-eul unbanhaneun geos-eulo hago ilbuneun sig-yong-eulo hayeossnola
geudeul-eun geugeosdeullo daleun yuyong ham-eul eodnani masil uyuleul eodnola geuleondedo geudeul-eun gamsahal jul moleu neunyo
geudeul-eun hananim anin daleun sindeul-eul sungbaehani geudeul-i doum-eul bad eul su iss-eulila gidaehaneunyo
usangdeul-eun geudeul-eul doul him-i eobs-eumyeo ohilyeo geudeul-eun usang-ui byeong salosseo bulliwo ganola
geudeul-ui mal-i geudaeleul seulpeuge haji anihalini hananim-eun geudeul-isumgineun geosgwa deuleonaeneun geos-eul asi nola
ingan-eun hananim-i geuleul jeong-aeg eulo jieusyeossdaneun geos-eul alji mosha neunyo bola geuleona geuneun ajigdo nonjaenghago issnola
ingan-eun hananimgwa yusahan geos deul-eul jieonaemyeo geuga changjodoen geos-eul ij-eobeoligo malhagil bupaehayeo beolin-i ppyeoe nuga saengmyeong-eul buyeohaneunyo lago hadeola
illeogalodoe hananimkkeseo taecho-e geudeul-eul changjohan saengmyeong-eul geudeul-e ge jusil geos-ila sillo geubun-eun modeungeos-eul changjohasim-eul algo gyesinola
neohuileul wihae puleun namueseo bul-eul bola geuttae neohuineun geugeos-eulo bul-eul balghinola
haneulgwa daejileul changjohasin geu bunkkeseo geugeosdeulgwa yusahan geos-eul chang johal su eobsdan mal-inyo geuleohji aniham-ila sillo geubun-eun modeun geos-eul changjohasimyeo asinola
sillo geubunkkeseo mueos-e tteus-eul dusigo iss-eola myeonglyeonghasimyeon geudaelodoenila
modeun manmul-eul jugwanhasin geubun kke yeong-gwang-i iss-eusoseo geu modeun geos-eungeubun-egelo gwiuihanola
